DOC.brief_summary: Overall improvement, severities and changes of specific clinical symptoms were surveyed in outpatients with depression or in a depressed state to evaluate the efficacy and safety of PAXIL tablets in patients in whom the PAXIL dose was increased and those treated with a constant dose.
DOC.brief_title: Special Drug Use Investigation for PAXIL Tablet (20mg-Clinical Symptom Progression)
DOC.criteria: Subjects who is 18 years or more Subjects diagnosed with depression or in a depressed state Subjects who have been treated with paroxetine prior to this investigation Subjects with hypersensitivity to paroxetine Subjects taking monoamine oxidase inhibitors (MAOIs) or within 2 weeks of stopping treatment with MAOIs Concomitant use in subjects taking pimozide
